attributes.action: introduce a Misrepresentation of the People Act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In short, to make each and every elected member of the government directly accountable to the people for any breach of honesty, in a legal sense. Therefore any MP who is proved to have been lying to  Parliament will have his or her political career permanently terminated. In time, this act will lead to renewed public confidence in the political system.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
